# Coder Rocks — The Agentic Coding Hub

> Coder Rocks is a technical content hub focused on AI-assisted development, autonomous coding agents, and modern software engineering.

## Content

Articles covering agentic coding, AI developer tools, programming languages, frameworks, and software engineering best practices.

## URLs

- Homepage: https://coder.rocks
- All Articles: https://coder.rocks/posts
- Topics: https://coder.rocks/topics
- Search: https://coder.rocks/search
- RSS Feed: https://coder.rocks/rss.xml
- Sitemap: https://coder.rocks/sitemap.xml

## Structure

- /posts/{slug}/ — Individual blog posts with technical content
- /topics/{tag}/ — Topic pages grouping articles by subject
- /search — Full-text search across all articles

## Contact

- Website: https://coder.rocks
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/coder_rocks
- Email: support@coder.rocks
